mapper.select: SELECT c.NAME AS communityName, h.building, h.unit, h.floor, h.door, CASE uh.check_status WHEN 0 THEN '未审核通过' WHEN 1 THEN '审核通过' WHEN 2 THEN '审核中' END as checkStatus FROM t_house AS h LEFT JOIN t_user_house AS uh ON h.id = uh.house_id AND uh.deleted = 0 LEFT JOIN t_community AS c ON uh.community_id = c.id WHERE h.deleted = 0 AND c.deleted = 0 AND uh.house_id = #{houseId} AND uh.uid = #{uid}
